title: Weapons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Weapons are worn equipment in the weapon slot used to deal damage in combat. One-handed weapons can be used with a shield in the shield slot and two-handed weapons prevent the use of the shield slot. Stackable weapons are all equipped at the same time. Some equipment used in other skills such as axes, pickaxes, the Imcando hammer, pearl fishing rods from Alry the Angler's Angling Accessories, and Amy's saw from Mahogany Homes are also equippable.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:WeaponThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Weapon
Artwork of some standard RuneScape weapons.

Weapons are worn equipment in the weapon slot used to deal damage in combat. One-handed weapons can be used with a shield in the shield slot and two-handed weapons prevent the use of the shield slot. Stackable weapons are all equipped at the same time. Some equipment used in other skills such as axes, pickaxes, the Imcando hammer, pearl fishing rods from Alry the Angler's Angling Accessories, and Amy's saw from Mahogany Homes are also equippable.

Contents

  • 1 Weapon bonuses
    • 1.1 Special attacks
  • 2 Weapon types
    • 2.1 Melee
    • 2.2 Ranged
      • 2.2.1 Thrown weapons
      • 2.2.2 Ammunition
    • 2.3 Magic
  • 3 Other

Weapon bonuses[edit | edit source]

All weapons have equipment stats, attack bonuses and defence bonuses in stab, slash, and crush melee combat, Ranged combat and Magic combat. Each also has a melee strength, Ranged strength, and Magic strength increasing maximum damage with that damage type and Prayer bonus that reduces the rate at which prayers drain points.

Weapons also have an attack speed, which is the rate at which it attacks and an attack range. Melee weapons, except for halberds, all have 1 attack range. Ranged and Magic weapons vary, however most magic weapons cast spells from 10 tiles away.

Special attacks[edit | edit source]

Main article: Special attacks

Certain weapons have special attacks while wielded requiring different amounts of energy to use. Special attacks are unique to a weapon and its upgrades. While most of them are offensive abilities, axes, pickaxes, and harpoons of dragon, infernal, 3rd age and crystal tools boost their respective skill by 3.

Weapon types[edit | edit source]

Melee[edit | edit source]

Main article: Weapons/Types ยง Melee weapons

Melee weapons are primarily used to attack directly next to a target, however halberds have 2 attack range. These do not require ammuition, except for a few weapons that need to be charged such as the scythe of vitur, Viggora's chainmace, or the blade of saeldor. All melee weapon level requirements are listed on the Attack or Strength level up table. Most of these start out at bronze equipment up to rune equipment for free-to-play while members have access to higher tier equipment like dragon, barrows or Abyssal weapons.

  • 2h swords
    • Godswords
  • Axes
    • Battleaxes
  • Banners
  • Blunt weapons
    • Abyssal bludgeon
    • Blackjacks
    • Fun weapons
    • Mauls
    • Warhammers
  • Dinh's bulwark
  • Claws
  • Pickaxes
  • Polearms
    • Halberds
  • Polestaves
    • Banners
    • Mjolnirs
  • Scythes
  • Slash swords
    • Cutlasses
    • Longswords
    • Machetes
    • Scimitars
    • Sickles
  • Spears
    • Hastae
  • Spiked weapons
    • Canes
    • Maces
  • Stab swords
    • Daggers
    • Harpoons
    • Swords
  • Unarmed
  • Whips

Ranged[edit | edit source]

Main article: Weapons/Types ยง Ranged weapons

Ranged weapons are used to attack from a distance, they all require ammunition to use except for crystal equipment. All Ranged weapon level requirements are listed on the Ranged level up table.

  • Blasters
  • Bows
    • Composite bows
    • Longbows
    • Shortbows
  • Chinchompas
  • Crossbows
    • Ballista
  • Guns

Thrown weapons[edit | edit source]

  • Thrown
    • Darts
    • Throwing knife
    • Thrownaxes
    • Toktz-xil-ul (rings)
    • Holy water

Ammunition[edit | edit source]

Main article: Ammunition
  • Javelins - Fired from ballistae
  • Bolts - Fired from crossbows
  • Arrows - Fired from bows
  • Cannonballs - Fire from Dwarf multicannon

Magic[edit | edit source]

Main article: Weapons/Types ยง Magic weapons

Magic weapons attack from a distance and come in two primary types, staves and wands. They can be used as melee weapons, however their primary function is for casting both combat and non-combat spells, taking place of elemental runes, auto cast, and access to specific spells like Magic Dart. All level requirements are listed on the Magic level up table.

  • Staves
    • Croziers
    • Elemental staves
    • Battlestaves
    • Mystic staves
    • Wands
  • Powered staves
  • Bladed staves

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Dwarf multicannon
  • Salamanders
  • Shields
    • Defenders

rawContent:
{{External|rs=Weapon|rsc=Weapon}}
[[File:Weapon slot.png|left|The weapon slot.]]
[[File:Weapons artwork.png|thumb|right|Artwork of some standard ''RuneScape'' weapons.]]
'''Weapons''' are [[worn equipment]] in the [[weapon slot]] used to deal damage in [[combat]]. One-handed weapons can be used with a [[Shields|shield]] in the [[shield slot]] and [[Worn Equipment#Two-handed items|two-handed weapon]]s prevent the use of the shield slot. Stackable weapons are all equipped at the same time. Some equipment used in other [[skill]]s such as [[axe]]s, [[pickaxe]]s, the [[Imcando hammer]], [[pearl fishing rod]]s from [[Alry the Angler's Angling Accessories]], and [[Amy's saw]] from [[Mahogany Homes]] are also equippable.

==Weapon bonuses==
All weapons have [[equipment stats]], attack bonuses and defence bonuses in stab, slash, and crush melee [[combat]], [[Ranged]] combat and [[Magic]] combat. Each also has a melee strength, Ranged strength, and Magic strength increasing maximum damage with that damage type and [[Prayer]] bonus that reduces the rate at which prayers drain points.

Weapons also have an [[attack speed]], which is the rate at which it attacks and an [[attack range]]. Melee weapons, except for [[halberd]]s, all have 1 attack range. Ranged and Magic weapons vary, however most magic weapons cast spells from 10 tiles away.

===Special attacks===
{{Main|Special attacks}}
Certain weapons have [[special attacks]] while wielded requiring different amounts of energy to use. Special attacks are unique to a weapon and its upgrades. While most of them are offensive abilities, [[axe]]s, [[pickaxe]]s, and [[harpoon]]s of [[dragon equipment|dragon]], [[Infernal tool|infernal]], [[3rd age]] and [[crystal tool]]s boost their respective [[skill]] by 3. 

==Weapon types==
===Melee===
{{Main|Weapons/Types#Melee weapons}}
[[Melee]] weapons are primarily used to attack directly next to a target, however [[halberd]]s have 2 attack range. These do not require ammuition, except for a few weapons that need to be charged such as the [[scythe of vitur]], [[Viggora's chainmace]], or the [[blade of saeldor]]. All [[Weapons/Types#Melee weapons|melee weapon]] level requirements are listed on the [[Attack/Level up table|Attack]] or [[Strength/Level up table|Strength level up table]]. Most of these start out at [[bronze equipment]] up to [[rune equipment]] for [[free-to-play]] while [[members]] have access to higher tier equipment like [[dragon equipment|dragon]], [[barrows equipment|barrows]] or [[Abyssal weapon]]s.

* [[2h sword]]s
** [[Godsword]]s
* [[Axe]]s
** [[Battleaxe]]s
* [[Banner]]s
* [[Blunt weapons]]
** [[Abyssal bludgeon]]
** [[Blackjack]]s

===Ranged===
{{Main|Weapons/Types#Ranged weapons}}
[[Ranged]] weapons are used to attack from a distance, they all require [[ammunition]] to use except for [[crystal equipment]]. All [[Weapons/Types#Ranged weapons|Ranged weapon]] level requirements are listed on the [[Ranged/Level up table|Ranged level up table]].

* [[Blaster]]s
* [[Bow]]s
** [[Composite bow]]s
** [[Longbow (weapon)|Longbow]]s
** [[Shortbow (weapon)|Shortbow]]s
* [[Chinchompas]]

====Thrown weapons====

====Ammunition====
{{Main|Ammunition}}
* [[Javelins]] - Fired from [[ballistae]]
* [[Bolts]] - Fired from [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]]s
* [[Arrows]] - Fired from [[bows]]
* [[Cannonball]]s - Fire from [[Dwarf multicannon]]

===Magic===
{{Main|Weapons/Types#Magic weapons}}
[[Weapons/Types#Magic weapons|Magic weapons]] attack from a distance and come in two primary types, [[staves]] and [[wand]]s. They can be used as melee weapons, however their primary function is for casting both combat and non-combat [[spell]]s, taking place of [[elemental]] [[rune]]s, [[auto cast]], and access to specific spells like [[Magic Dart]]. All level requirements are listed on the [[Magic/Level up table|Magic level up table]].

* [[Staves]]
** [[Crozier]]s
